title: Exempts certain easements from the real estate transfer tax
summary: Exempts public use easements from the real estate transfer tax and provides that the grantor of such easement shall be immune from civil liability and action with respect to any act or omission relating to such easement; defines "public use" for the purposes of this subparagraph.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting certain easements from the real estate transfer tax
